availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Suter (Owen County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Suter. Father of Ann W. Suter, Elizabeth J. Suter, John Suter, Benjamin Suter, Bell D. Suter, and James Suter. Physician in Owen County, Kentucky in 1850. Physician in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 246B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 78.
Find A Grave, "Dr George W. Suter (14 Feb 1819-31 Aug 1896)," Memorial #47768025, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47768025 (accessed June 17, 2020).
